definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: (usu.) pass. (Aram. [[אתכחדו]] be effaced † Job 4:7; kh.ad is revere, Pt. venerable, Pa. put to shame, Ethpa. be ashamed; Eth. kh.d: deny, apostatize)—
be hidden, sq. [[מִן]] pers., 2Sa 18:13, Ho 5:3, Ps 69:6, Ps 139:15.
be effected, destroyed Zec 11:9, Job 4:7, Job 15:28 ([[עָרִים נִכְחְדוֹת]]), Job 22:20, sq. [[מִן־]] [[הָאָרֶץ]] Ex 9:15 (J); Pt. intrans. of incomplete process = going to ruin Zec 11:9, Zec 11:16.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[כִּחֵד]] 1Sa 3:18; 1 S. [[כִּחַדְתִּי]] Job 6:10, Ps 40:11; 3 pl. [[כִּחֲדוּ]] Job 15:18; [[כִּחֵָדוּ]] Is 3:9; Impf. 2 ms. [[תְּכַחֵד]] Jos 7:19 + 4 t.; 2 fs. [[תְּכַחֲדִי]] 2Sa 14:18; 1 S. [[אֲכַחֵד]] Job 27:11; 2 mpl. [[תְּכַחֵָדוּ]] Je 50:2; 1 pl. [[נְכַחֵד]] Ge 47:18, Ps 78:4; —hide, sq. [[מִן]] pers. Ge 47:18 (J), Jos 7:19 (JE), 1Sa 3:17, 1Sa 3:17, 1Sa 3:18, 2Sa 14:18, Je 38:14, Je 38:25, Ps 78:4; sq. [[לְ]] pers. Ps 40:11 conceal toward, with ref. to, i.e. from; without prep. Is 3:9, Je 50:2, Job 15:18, Job 27:11; = disown Job 6:10.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. consec. sf. [[וְהִכְחַדְתִּיו]] Ex 23:23; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיַּכְחֵד]] 2Ch 32:21, sf. [[יַכְחִידֶנׇּה]] Job 20:12; 1 S. [[וׇאַכְחִד]] Zec 11:8; 1 pl. sf. [[וְנַכְחִידֵם]] Ps 83:5; Inf. cstr. [[לְהַכְחִיד]] 1Ki 13:34; —
hide, in fig. [[יַכְחִידֶנׇּה]] [[תַּחַת לְשׁׂנוֹ]] Job 20:12 (obj. wickedness).
efface, annihilate Ex 23:23 (E), 1Ki 13:34 (‖[[הַשְׁמִיד]]), Zec 11:8 2 Ch 2Ch 32:21; sq. [[מִגּוֹי]] Ps 83:5, i.e. from being (so that they be not) a nation.
